ygData.subject: Re: [EQCheats] wizard issues (sorry for crosspost) trying for large   audience
ygData.msgSnippet: Whatever you do and if its fun or boring, you do fight (with spells) great and I don t see why you need to get more advantages? And what is it that the wizards
ygData.messageBody:
Whatever you do and if its fun or boring, you do fight (with spells) great and I
don't see why you need to get more advantages? And what is it that the wizards
want?

Drokk, da majik trollie

mferrulo@... wrote:

> From: mferrulo@...
>
> In a message dated 3/22/00 3:15:06 PM Eastern Standard Time,
> MadGrizzle@... writes:
>
> <<
> I quit a level 29 wizard to start a rogue back in July. Never missed the
> wizard, not nearly as fun as the rogue. Wizards just nuke and med... Kinda
> boring IMO, but, hey, that's what a wizard is. >>
>
> Sorry friend, but you are incredibly wrong. A truly skilled Wizard is much
> more than Nuke and Med. I don't have time to debate you on this, let me just
> paste below a post from a fellow Wizard from the Wizard Listserv - It is good
> reading for anyone regardless of class. The Nuances of playing a Wizard well
> are beyond many, but they are vast and incredibly fun and challenging.
>
> Wizaro Wrathcaster
> 44th Flame of Solusek Ro's Fire
>
